title: ICE: "cannot convert ReErased to a region vid" after adding unused variable

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I didn't yet come up with a minimal example. So far for reproduction `elfo` crate is needed (which is quite big bruh). Here's the repo with the code: https://github.com/l4l/ice-bwck-unused-todo ### Meta Tried on stable 1.64.0, 1.65.0 and nightly 1.66.0 (470e518c4 2022-09-27). ### Error output ``` compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/universal_regions.rs:810:36: cannot convert `ReErased` to a region vid ```
Shortened backtrace

``` 20: 0x7f01cd89aea3 - rustc_middle[b6cf56a787d1e2a1]::util::bug::bug_fmt 21: 0x7f01cdc58c49 - ::convert_all 22: 0x7f01cdc29a8a - ::normalize_and_prove_instantiated_predicates 23: 0x7f01cdc26156 - ::visit_constant 24: 0x7f01cdc10769 - ::visit_body 25: 0x7f01cdbb5c32 - rustc_borrowck[9bf94ea6123d60bb]::type_check::type_check 26: 0x7f01cdb922ce - rustc_borrowck[9bf94ea6123d60bb]::nll::compute_regions 27: 0x7f01cdb7cdaf - rustc_borrowck[9bf94ea6123d60bb]::do_mir_borrowck 28: 0x7f01ce82794d - rustc_borrowck[9bf94ea6123d60bb]::mir_borrowck 29: 0x7f01ce826e60 - >::call_once 30: 0x7f01ce13a39f - >::with_task:: 31: 0x7f01ce13967d - rustc_query_system[8caf4755e287670e]::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 32: 0x7f01ced4356a - ::mir_borrowck 33: 0x7f01ce8304d3 - rustc_data_structures[49e7163a34b889d1]::sync::par_for_each_in::<&[rustc_span[721a57c036170ce]::def_id::LocalDefId], ::par_body_owners::{closure#0}> 34: 0x7f01ce82fc8b - ::par_body_owners:: 35: 0x7f01ce82fb63 - ::time::<(), rustc_interface[f934826ba4c12dd9]::passes::analysis::{closure#2}> 36: 0x7f01ce82f955 - rustc_interface[f934826ba4c12dd9]::passes::analysis 37: 0x7f01cebea2bc - >::with_task::> 38: 0x7f01cebe9aab - rustc_query_system[8caf4755e287670e]::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 39: 0x7f01cebe95fe - rustc_query_system[8caf4755e287670e]::query::plumbing::get_query:: 40: 0x7f01ce5c3d87 - ::enter::> 41: 0x7f01ce5bc97f - ::enter::, rustc_errors[5fcb1a1f56a762e6]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 42: 0x7f01ce5b186a - rustc_span[721a57c036170ce]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[f934826ba4c12dd9]::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver[4568cc0a685fd94d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 43: 0x7f01ce5b11a2 - >::set::, rustc_driver[4568cc0a685fd94d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[6fcc70bcc91a5bf5]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[5fcb1a1f56a762e6]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 44: 0x7f01ce5af5cf - std[306a94a967d8f5ee]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver[4568cc0a685fd94d]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[6fcc70bcc91a5bf5]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[5fcb1a1f56a762e6]::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}, core[6fcc70bcc91a5bf5]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[5fcb1a1f56a762e6]::ErrorGuaranteed>> ```

Triggered this after [adding](https://github.com/l4l/ice-bwck-unused-todo/blob/770a47283a2631cee82d99e40f32a2d571dbfe56/src/lib.rs#L18) `let x: = todo()`, if literal is set instead there's no ICE. Looks similar to #96304 or #78174 but this one doesn't require nightly features.
